name: Halloween Outfit | Clothing
description:
Halloween Outfit | Clothing


HAPPY HALLOWEEN! Why now do u ask? It just depends, when u are gonna download this LoRA. :)

Weight can go from 0.3 up to 1.0. I recommend 0.7. ControlNet will streamline full body shots much easier, or more complex poses. Works with almost every Style, every Character, Photorealistic Models and NSFW LoRA's. For some reason not with every Checkpoint. I will fix that soon.

The Main triggerword is Halloween. I recommend using more weight on this like (Halloween:1.2). You can go higher, like (Halloween:1.7) and it will give most of the time ruined makeup. Also changes most of the time the Background, if unprompted.

This LoRA most of the time combines the main Outfit from the Character with Halloween Outfit. If you don't want that, then add dress, thighhighs, or leotard.

Trigger Word:

Halloween or (Halloween:1.2)

Helping Prompt:
dress, thighhighs, leotard

How to use LoRA's in auto1111:

  • Download LoRA

  • Copy the file to stable-diffusion-webui/models/lora

  • Select your LoRA and use the triggerword

  • Make sure to change the weight if needed (by default it's :1)

  • Have Fun!
